alert.note: Alert for Absaroka Mountains; Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:25PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Hot Springs and central Fremont Counties through 515 PM MDT... At 424 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Crowheart to Christina Lake. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Red Canyon, Sinks Canyon State Park, Lander, Hudson, Anchor Dam, Riverton and Arapahoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for central Wyoming.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka Mountains; Lander Foothills; Owl Creek and Bridger Mountains; Upper Wind River Basin; Wind River Basin; Wind River Mountains East
